# AMP Email Quiz Template

* [AMP for Email](https://amp.dev/about/email/)
* [Gmail AMP for Email Playground](https://amp.gmail.dev/playground/)
* [AMP Playground](https://playground.amp.dev/?runtime=amp4email&mode=Responsive)

## Background

Many news organizations create quizzes about events that happened during the week. These organizations usually send out an email to their subscribers containing a link to the quiz hosted on their website. I thought it would be interesting to try building the weekly news quiz completely inside the email using AMP.

The AMP quiz template files are very similar. The only difference is that `amp-quiz-template-colorcoded.html` uses `AMP.setState` to display the quiz results with color. To view these AMP emails, go to the [Gmail AMP for Email Playground](https://amp.gmail.dev/playground/) and paste in the template code.

Alternatively, you can try taking a US history quiz using AMP for Email [here](https://playground.amp.dev/?runtime=amp4email&mode=Responsive#).
